org.ensembl.driver
Interface LocationConverter

All Superinterfaces:
Adaptor, java.rmi.Remote
public interface LocationConverter
extends java.rmi.Remote, Adaptor

Converts locations between different coordinate systems.

Method Detail

convert

public Location convert(Location sourceLocation,
                        CoordinateSystem targetCS,
                        boolean includeGaps,
                        boolean allList,
                        boolean includeSequenceRegion)
                 throws AdaptorException
Create a new location in the target coordinate system that is equivalent to the sourceLocation.

Parameters:
sourceLocation -
targetCS - This is where you want to convert to
includeGaps - you include or omit gaps that would be in the converted Location
allList - You may work just on the first node or on the full list
includeSequenceRegion - If true, includes sequenceRegion attribute in returned location.
Returns:
Location in _targetCS_ corresponding to _sourceLocation_
Throws:
AdaptorException

Sets the sequence region name and coordinate system on _loc_.

Returns:

Throws:

fetchComplete

public Location fetchComplete(Location location)
                       throws AdaptorException
Ensures the location is fully specified by filling in missing values with data from the database. A fully specified (complete) location has values for all these attributes: coordinate system name and version, sequence region name, start, end and strand. If any of these values are missing and can be extracted from the database then they will be set. If no corresponding complete location exists, e.g. the sequence region is not in the database, then null is returned.

Parameters:
location - potentially incomplete location.
Returns:
location with CoordinateSystem, seqRegionName, start and end set, or null if the location cannot be completed.
Throws:
AdaptorException

convertToTopLevel

public Location convertToTopLevel(Location location)
                           throws AdaptorException
Fetch the location representing this one in the lowest ranking coordinate system.

Parameters:
location - source location to be converted
Returns:
The location with the lowest level coordinate system corresponding to the location, or null if non exists.
Throws:
AdaptorException

                            SequenceRegion seqRegion)
